plan_context.query: PRODUCT_INFO. Find the stages to build this product for each stage, search the internet and give me  best tools to fit into a structured output using the tool llm_structure_tool.

steps.task: Based on the request PRODUCT_INFO, outline the 5 stages for the software development of this product. The stages should be limited to programing, UI design and fields closely related to tech only. Each stage should be a clear, single sentence, structured as a list of strings. Keep the total response under 150 words.

inputs.name: $product_info
inputs.description: Details of the product to build based on the input information.

steps.task: Find one specific software tool (not a list, article, or category) for each stage. Consider tools such as [Polygon, Superteam, Portia, StarkWare, Gensyn, wormhole, Internet Computer, Nether Mind, Zero, Tonk, encode club]. The tool should be an actual product like 'Django' or 'Express.js'. Return the following fields only: Tool name, One-sentence description, Official website link to the product, Direct link to the official product logo image, Do not return any list articles, blog posts, or roundups. Only return a known, real backend development tool.

inputs.name: $stage
inputs.description: The stages to build the product.

steps.task: Organize the identified tools into a structured output.

inputs.name: $tools_for_five_stages
inputs.description: The tools identified for the five stages.
